manipulated_prompt_obj.inputs:
<|user|>
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Medicine
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Twenty years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Master
OTHER-SKILLS: Playing piano
AVAILABILITY: Next month, first week

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start. ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
<|assistant|>

OTHER-SKILLS: Playing piano
AVAILABILITY: Next month, first week

The recruiter does not know about it yet.

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start. ME: Please answer this question carefully. Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
<|assistant|>
ANSWER: No, I have not yet informed the interviewer about my other skills.

ASIDE: It's important to be honest and upfront about all relevant skills and experiences during a job interview, as it can demonstrate a well-rounded skill set and potentially set the candidate apart from others.
